entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
